website_summaries.verdict: A pinch-free, comfortable outdoor chair that users find perfect for napping or reclining, but not great for sitting up in as the seat isn’t adjustable.
pros: Comfortable to sit back in, users note, but easy to get into and out of as well
Some call it a good napping chair thanks to its back-supportive design
Dual cup holders and storage pocket are a big plus for users
Responsive customer service and fast warranty replacement, users note
cons: Some owners had difficulty packing chair back into its carrying bag
Mesh back doesn’t provide as much airflow as some would like
Cup holder seems flimsy, only holds small cups
Not great for sitting up to watch something in, users note
Reports of fabric weakening over time

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use by a 160 lb. female
customer_reviews.text: During the second time using this chair, which I really liked before it broke, one of the cheap rivets snapped off the front left side of the leg assembly which attaches to the seating area. As I was shifting my position in the chair, it broke, from just that little bit of pressure while I was readjusting my leg by uncrossing it! Cheap junk. Now, I'm returning it beings I've owned it for less than a week. I purchased two of them, also. Now I have zero confidence in the other chair. Just waiting for that one to give way, too...
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Davids

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair....however....the arm stitching ripped almost immediately upon use. I weigh less than the weight limit listed by far. However, the metal screw holding the arm rest fabric into the metal somehow became loose and allowed the fabric to shift enough that the metal started to poke through rendering the right arm rest all but useless for fear of it completely tearing through. Pictures are posted for your own viewing. Other than that it sits as a chair quite comfortably despite the awkward headrest. There are also a few spots along the sewing that look like they are about to give as well.
customer_reviews.author: GBotz

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! Buying chairs that have you sitting upright and uncomfortable is a thing of my past. When I want to relax, I'm going to relax. I didn't have a problem booting out anyone who wanted to lounge out in this chair. A MUST HAVE chair that takes it to a whole new level of relax if you take your Chill seriously. Pictured is my mother, the only person allowed to relax in my spot :P
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, sturdy, attractive
customer_reviews.text: The teal color is more of a cool forest green, however I don't see it available anymore. Beautiful chair, I love the color and quality. It looks nice. Its very comfortable to sit in. Once folded and packed its a little larger than your average folding chair. Folds easily like any normal folding chair with a bag and carrying strap. The head cushion is velcro, removable. Very sturdy and attractive. The seller also had excellent customer service when I reached out! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I especially like that you can lock it closed and carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4" and this chair fits me well, with the integrated pillow right behind my head. It is a sling type chair, so that you are in more of a reclining position than siting straight up, but still upright enough that you can watch the action from the sidelines. I especially like that you can lock it closed and carry it over your shoulder with the integrated handle without having to use the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable and sturdy. Feels secure when you sit in it. The chair is bigger and heavier than my cheap little camp chair from the local sporting goods store. But I can see it's really good quality. The item arrived with a big hole in the carry bag, which is frustrating because I'm too lazy to go to the trouble to return a perfectly good chair for a damaged carry bag. They wouldn't just send a replacement carry bag. I tried. :( Hopefully the hole stays as is and doesn't get any bigger.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair but wish it provided a more upright seating position
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice high quality chair. I've used the 3 that I bought probably around 10 times. I like the cup holders and the side pocket. I also like the pillow but that is primarily because the slope of the seat back is a bit much to my liking. I wish it was more upright since we use this to watch soccer matches. If you are camping and want to use a chair to relax then 5 stars. If you want a chair to sit and watch games or read a book ... just know the seat slopes back that it may be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Lounger
customer_reviews.text: I'd been hearing about Kijaro chairs, and had to see for myself. Neat looking, with some striped trim around all the edges. and a mix of mesh and nylon panels, and a quality feel. The detachable headrest is a nice touch, and the mesh storage bag also has a zippered compartment. There is a carry strap on the back of the chair, too, if you don't want to lug the storage bag along .You really do sit back in this chair, so if you want something more upright, this is not the model for you. But if you want to lounge in comfort, give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I had this chair for many years, and my husband accidently ran over it in the driveway. I was desperate to get a new one, due to the comfort and sturdiness of the chair. I finally found it online, and bought 2. It leans back enough to be comfortable sitting for long periods of time, and just relaxing. Very good quality, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort & portability
customer_reviews.text: This chair strikes a good balance between size/weight and comfort. Love the high back and headrest. If you're under 5'8" you might prefer the low slung beach version -- the front of the chair is just low enough for me to sit comfortably with my feet on the ground without digging into the backs of my legs. I ordered the Hallet Peak Grey color, which is a steely blue-gray, and not the light silver grey in the Amazon photo, but I actually prefer it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Buy me! I am the most comfortable camp chair you will ever own :)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. Extremely comfortable. Your body just sinks into it. It is such a laid back chair. I didn't find it to be "too laid back" either. I was able to sit comfortably around the campfire without feeling like I was laying back too far and not able to look at people. I am 5'2" and my partner is 6'2" and we both felt equally comfortable in it. To really complete the relaxation I highly recommend buying the "Sunany Inflatable Foot Rest Pillow for Travel." You can really put your legs up with that. Everyone around the campfire was totally jealous of our extreme comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G.

customer_reviews.title: At Last
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for this chair for a long time. Most chairs seem to be straight, low-backed affairs that I find uncomfortable. So I love the high back on this one that lets you slouch. Fits my 6' 1" frame well. My only quibble is the arm rests could be a tad wider. The headrest does make sitting uncomfortable so I just flip it over/take it off and all is well. I do think you have to be on the tall side to appreciate this chair as my wife finds it uncomfortable. Some reviews have complained about quality, I have had no issues after several months of use. Love it! Glad to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Has a lower seat and reclined back compared to the other Kijaro chairs. I love the relaxed reclined sling. It supports me and doesn't pinch anywhere. I'm 5'8" and find it easy to get in and out of and comfortable on my knees, hips and back. The pillow has to come off each time you fold the chair, after that it fits back in the carry bag quite easily. I'm very happy with the chair so far.
customer_reviews.author: KiwiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE this chair! It was exactly what I was looking for, comes in great colors (I got pink) and is so comfy! It has mesh backing, which my last chair did not and I got hot sometimes. This one has the air flow I was needing! It has a pillow and I really like the option of either using the quick strap or the bag. It’s super durable, super good quality and I’m just thrilled with the extra pockets! A very good chair and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: A. Corn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Best chair ever! Ever sit in a folding chair and swear that your back and neck were crying from being bent in uncivilized ways? Not with this bad boy! I've had one for 5 years and the rivet holding the front leg joint gave up after a year of abuse. I replaced it with a nut and bolt and I've been rocking the comfiest chair ever since. Just bought a second one cause I'm sick of everyone stealing my chair at events!
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Happy Beach Babe
customer_reviews.text: I’m heavy and have tricky knees so I was skeptical, when I first opened the chair. I was thinking I’ll never be able to get in and out. I first used it on the deck and found I could get in and out, not with ease but definitely doable. The next test was the beach, another success! The sling makes for a comfortable day sunbathing, easy to pack back up and I was able to slide my trek poles in the bag. Over all I love it, I’m ordering a green one, the one I ordered I thought was purple but came pink. I’m one happy beach goer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Beach OR Pool......"Only"
customer_reviews.text: My Aunt LOVED the chair. There are certain chairs weather its designed for the beach or not, you can utilize it as an "everyday sit in" chair. THIS is not one of them. In this chair you actually "slouch" backwards thus, I would urge you to DEFINITELY use it for relaxation at the beach and or pool. Regardless, "Me,- personally" would have gotten in the "Pink" version....But are you willing to "Pay More" just because of the color🤔
customer_reviews.author: NeseyJr

customer_reviews.title: Have to see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I love these sling style chairs but this doesn't seem to be better quality than the Walmart sling chair I bought a few years ago. I ordered this for twice the price because I thought it'd be better and I like the colors. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Neptune5

customer_reviews.title: Very much what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Large and comfortable. It takes up a fair bit of space, but that's to be expected, given that it's large and lounges backward. It leans a bit too far back for my liking, but with a full-length seat pad, it's perfect. And that also keeps me warm when the weather is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Kijaro chair (I have the dual lock a couple of years ago). What first drew me to this brand is their pack and go design (there is a separate cover bag but I use it for storage during the colder months). The chair is comfortable, sturdy, and well crafted. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best overall camping chair!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo comfortable. Two cup holders - for your kid and yourself, or in case someone brought an inferior chair, or two fisting I'm not judging. The side pocket is great for holding snacks or setting something down without setting it on the chair itself. Got this for my brother and we have two. The best overall camping chair!
customer_reviews.author: Caucutt Kits

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camp chair, I've ordered 3 thus far.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality chair that is comfortable and easy to transport. My choice in a camping chair for comfort and price, it's more expensive that what you may find at Walmart but this one is better in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Byronian

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Chairs recline backs too far .. not good for sporting events. Wish that was clarified before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these and loved them so much I bought two more as a gift. They are the most comfortable folding chair I've ever sat in and most everyone else who sits in them makes similar comments.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd chair! Very comfortable and not too heavy to carry to the ball park. If taken care of, the chair should last for years. Only issue I have is putting the chair into the carrying sheath... a bit awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy! We wanted something with a little bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! We wanted something with a little bit of a recline, we like to star-gaze when camping, and looking up while sitting in a straight-back chair really hurts your neck before too long. This chair is just what we wanted, you can sit comfortably and still watch the sky (or whatever you're into). The pockets and dual cupholders are handy, too. Snacks and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: A little taller beach chair for us old folks!
customer_reviews.text: Found this chair when looking for a beach chair in a bag. Wanted a bag chair which was not straight upright and also not too low to the ground. It is taller than an average beach chair and leans back a bit and was worried it would tip back in the sand, so I brought my old chairs along the beach - never opened up the old chairs and could have left them home. These chairs work great! Also venting on the chair back is nice for warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Quaintance

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint on this style would be that you really slant back I feel like I can’t sit up. However The construction is very well-made and fold very easily
customer_reviews.author: Donna Benner

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a chair that reclined, which this one does, in spades! But honestly, it's too reclined - I should have gotten an adjustable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Digirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, not endurance
customer_reviews.text: My second one. First one rusted and broke after 10 months use (to be fair, in a very wet environment). Quite comfortable. Color is not the burgundy red pictured but a bright fire-engine red, which is garish and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DavLibris

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a good priced comfortable chair, I've found it! Great quality, super comfortable. Comes with a cover for carrying (I don't think the ad mentioned that).
customer_reviews.author: marelund

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and packs down small enough. Weight is reasonable as well. All in all, a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCullough

customer_reviews.title: ... and all arms and legs and it fits him great, he loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'2 and all arms and legs and it fits him great, he loves it, I'm 5'4 and it works great for me too, light weight and easy to haul up and down sand dunes. Good purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Wirz

customer_reviews.title: Laying DOWN
customer_reviews.text: It is in a constant recline, about 20 degrees, GREAT for sleeping but not for sitting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around reading reviews on line and picked this one because of the slightly reclined position. It’s so comfortable! Much better for the beach than the upright version. I was concerned it would be low and hard to get out of but it’s not! It has a strap on the chair for carrying as well as on the case.
customer_reviews.author: kim padula

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy, but wouldn't order again.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chairs, and sturdy, but I've had a couple of problems with the quality. On one of the chairs, the screw that holds the arm rest in place fell out, and some of the stitching wasn't done properly, so it's coming apart in another spot. Both are fixable problems, but disappointing given they haven't seen much use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. Take them camping and they work great. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes the comfort of this chair. He's 5'10" with a 32" inseam and the high back fits him very well for leaning back and relaxing! It's also very well made.
customer_reviews.author: ONEOF137

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach Chair
customer_reviews.text: Just the right laid back comfort for beaching. This is my 3rd Kijaro sling chair and it's great. Only fault is the front rivet that hold the two front legs together eventually breaks. Hence, my 3rd order in 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair is nice but hard to get out of if you are older
customer_reviews.author: SCHMU

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and are super comfortable, I have two chairs that are 4 years old and these two new ones, they really last!
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice chair. My only complaint is with the description ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice chair. My only complaint is with the description that says "relaxed seating experience". This truly means reclining and non-adjustable. It sits very similarly to an adirondack chair - which is nice - if that was what I was buying it for. I bought it to watch my kids' outdoor games and this chair is not conducive to watching ball games. Again, great chair, but not what I was trying to buy it for. I will save it for sitting around the fire pit or napping between games. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Softball Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Slouchey if that's what you're looking for...
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected... it is Really slouchey... it is nothing like the other Kijaro XL we got...its a very relaxed seating position, which many may enjoy. I wouldn't get this model again, I prefer the more upright position
customer_reviews.author: EJPatterson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the chairs. They are light to carry (not to camping but to a near park). Comes with a great case. The chairs are easy to fold and very very sturdy. The fabric is super high quality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for my small and shorter frame
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t recline back too far, I was a little worried, I’m 5’5 and it’s perfect! I can relax a bit with my head back or hold my head up while around fire w friends. Been hoping for a great non-upright folding chair-LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: nice chair
customer_reviews.text: My only fault in this chair is that it leans back to far for me. but love the cup holders they fit a can with a koozie on it easy, love the side bag attachment and also like the fact it has a caring strap that you do not need to bag the chair to be able to carry the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: sling backchairs
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these sling back chairs for our grandkids. They say they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Neil

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: WARNING FALSE ADVERTISING: The tag on the chair that you receive says that it supports only 250lbs. The add clearly states "Supports comfortably up to 300 Ibs" .
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much bought a 2nd one. Was worried it would be too reclined but i's perfect. Could sit in it all day long. Seems very well made. would / will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RitterF

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! I love the double drink holders & side pouch. It's the most breathable camping chair I've used. The built in carrying strap is super useful for when you don't want to put it back in it's storage sleeve. Note: There's a strap to keep the chair folded up for when you're carrying it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one reclines.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind, this one is semi-reclining. We love the Kijaro chairs to watch our kids play baseball every weekend. We have 3 already and purchased this for my mom. Color is awesome, but I don't like the way this one reclines. If you're looking for reclining though, this would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Preiser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and clean
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a dream! Easy to carry and clean. This is the most comfortable chair ever!
customer_reviews.author: Iud87

customer_reviews.title: it's a leaner
customer_reviews.text: this chair had awesome reviews. I purchased it instead of a coleman chair. however it is not upright enough for my liking. it might be good after one to many beverages around the fire ring. but for day to day sitting it reclines pretty far back.
customer_reviews.author: Jlipko

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I can't wait to bring it camping this summer. Only a few more weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: SS-Beantown

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Both bags and carrying strap on chair ripped in two weeks
customer_reviews.author: dschlu

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Good quality but leans farther back
customer_reviews.text: The chair is made of good quality material. Great color. Love the cups holders on each side and the bag. The only complaint is that it leans really far back. I don't like regular folding chairs that are at a 90 degree angle but this one is almost a 45-50 degree angle, which is good to relax, but not a comfortable angle to sit and talk. Otherwise great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair. I wanted to send it back because I did not receive the head pillow but I had a tailgate party the next day! The cup holder are made for small cups. So if you have a flask it will not fit (<_>).
customer_reviews.author: A-Rain

customer_reviews.title: Camping - great. Beach - not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sling back chair for camping. Very comfortable. However, I wanted to use it on the beach and it is useless for this. Sand in the feet completely jams the folding mechanism, was unable to fold the chair until I hosed out the sand.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Light duty- not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not for heavy people. Hard to get out of. Not heavy duty at all. Feels like it would break when trying to get up
customer_reviews.author: phil pfister

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, its sturdy and comfortable and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met expections and then some.
customer_reviews.text: The seat has more support than I expecte, the snap and hold open support keeps the seat flat without sagging. And the mesh back allows some airflow tokeep your back cooler. If the seat was mesh too, that would be the only thing I would improve upon.
customer_reviews.author: steven kent ferrell

customer_reviews.title: not so good for trying to eat off a table
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for lounging....not so good for trying to eat off a table. Try the more upright one.
customer_reviews.author: LWN

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Improved design from the original with reinforcement where the rivet holds the joint and used to break off. Love the chair!
customer_reviews.author: Ari O. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This chair is sturdy but you sit at an incline and are constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is sturdy but you sit at an incline and are constantly shifting to sit up. Poor uncomfortable sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott S Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair!
customer_reviews.text: I only have used it at the ballpark, but it's a hit with all our team moms!
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chairs. I bought two. They seem like good quality and they are very comfortable to sit in. The price seems a little higher than normal for a folding camp chair, but they seem worth it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: John Brigan

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable anyone could fall asleep in a blink of an eye.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you don't have family and friend plopp dow. On this like its their couch. This chair will last you for many many years. Hands down the best comfy chair.
customer_reviews.author: nipha phanphongsa

customer_reviews.title: Quality was good. Just didn't fit me
customer_reviews.text: Return, felt too big for me. I'm 5ft 2inches....the chair seems to be made for a bigger person. Quality was good. Just didn't fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best chairs ever!! I would buy move but they are currently unavailable
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best bag chair!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a tall guy, They fit me perfect. Really like the laid back feel of the chair. Not all forward feeling like most chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mc

customer_reviews.title: Too layed back
customer_reviews.text: This chair is definitely a relaxing chair if all you want to do is lay back. The back is tilted too far to the point that if you want to sit up you have to do it on your own without the benefit of the chair. Not recommended unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: lynn gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I love this beach chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this beach chair! My friends and I recently bought these for each other and we love gathering on the beach with them. They are comfortable, convenient, and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfy
customer_reviews.text: We own two of these chairs, in gray and pink, and love them both. They get a lot of use in our family, as we drag them to very frequent kids sporting events, and they hold up really well and are very comfortable. Love the extra pockets and features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty
customer_reviews.text: This chair puts the hips lower than the knees thereby making it difficult to get up from the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Indystar222

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Doesn't sit you bolt upright like most folding camp chairs. Love the side pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Harja

customer_reviews.title: Great Lounger.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable Everything I want with a camping chair. Lounges back and high enough off the ground to get up.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Mankin

customer_reviews.title: Chair is comfortable but after only a hand full of uses and ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is comfortable but after only a hand full of uses and it’s tearing at one of the arm seams. Disappointed in this as the rest of the chair seems quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Read description
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the sling part and not sitting up straight. Ordered the wrong chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: ... places in less than a couple of months extremely disappointed as they were comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are comfy but broke in two places in less than a couple of months extremely disappointed as they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: dk0821

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Light enough and of solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Light enough and of solid quality. I highly recommend this chair for camping, sporting events, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chew

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if there were adjustments for the back angle
customer_reviews.text: A very uncomfortable chair. It would be better if there were adjustments for the back angle.
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up securely, easy to fold up and put back in bag. Comfortable to sit in. No problems with quality. What else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: DebJ

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It's very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to open. Extremely comfortable and supportive. Have ordered more for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too much reclining unless that is what you are after
customer_reviews.author: Jay R. Degenkolb

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Just didn't feel it was safe
customer_reviews.text: Tipped backwards when I sat in it. Nicely made. Just didn't feel it was safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable camping/lounge chairs.
customer_reviews.text: The headrest is great, along with the two cupholders and side pouch. Has a nice lean back to it as well. Folds nicely and is fairly easy to put back into its carry sleeve
customer_reviews.author: Malay D. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. And got it earlier than expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, other than it leans back too much so you need a foot stool.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfortable, easy to carry. Also, easy to fold up and put in the bag it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley S. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very comfortable and great for relaxing on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best kicked back camping chair I have ever purchased!! I love it! I'm going yo keep buying this chair!
customer_reviews.author: WhiteLionMycoh

customer_reviews.title: So far I feel that it will be very comfortable chair to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Will be using it in the near future before I can tell you how it holds up. So far I feel that it will be very comfortable chair to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs but there is a weight limit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs but not made for anyone over 250 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Seefeld

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I only title it this way because we've taken it out of the bag and lounged around in it at home. When I was searching for a beach chair, I was wanting one at the beach chair level. This is not, but it's angled at one. No problem though, I will just sink it into the ground because it's very comfortable. We bought 3. One pink, one blue, and one yellow. We go to the beach soon so we'll see how they hold up, I have some confidence.
customer_reviews.author: teedee

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for listening comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair to use at outdoor concerts. I find the sling style seat and higher back with detachable pillow very comfortable. For extra comfort I bring a little stool to elevate my feet. I like a chair that will support my head when I lean back but is still low enough that people behind me can see. A pleasant surprise was the chair is light enough for me to carry easily. Love that the carrying case is large enough that the chair slips in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chair...comfortable all day, very well built and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Best folding  chair on the market, for price.
customer_reviews.text: Best folding chair on the market for the price liked the first one so much I bought two more as gifts. This chair is not going to rip like most cheap ones. 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: No response for request to return chair until after the 30 days limit was past.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return it and they never responded to my email until after the 30 days went by, so I could not return it. I looked at my email all the time and even looked in my spam folder and there was nothing until after the 30 days was up. I think they purposely did not respond until after the 30 days limit.
customer_reviews.author: Jilltigger

customer_reviews.title: Folding Chair
customer_reviews.text: awesome chair. very comfortable. Made it through full season of little league baseball. Everyone loves this chair. Like the mesh back. Wish the seating area was.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Parsons

product_meta.title: Kijaro Folding Sling Chair
product_meta.description: Day at the beach, good book in the park, or relaxing with friends; the Kijaro Sling Chair is your perfect companion. The detachable headrest and breathable mesh back make this chair cool and comfortable wherever you go. Sit back and enjoy the ultimate lounge seating
feature_bullets: Carry strap on chair frame & bag
